text: John Bentley (born 16 November 1957) is an Australian rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Australian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Australia Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: John Bentley (rower)
